Solution of
C200B40A82

1100001000000000101101000000101010000010

110 000 1000000000101101000000101010000010
v6  id0 => we have a sum
1 00000000010 1101000000101010000010
length_type = 1 => 11 bits of length type
00000000010 = 2 is the number of subpackets each of 11 bits

calculate_sum(1101000000101010000010)

110 100 00001 010 100 00010
v6  id4 1     v2  id4 2
1 + 2 = 3


Solution of 
04005AC33890

000001000000000001011010110000110011100010010000

000 001 000000000001011010110000110011100010010000
v0  id1 => we have a product
0 000000000010110 10110000110011100010010000
length_type = 0 => 15 bits of length type
000000000010110 = 22 is the number of bits in subpacket

calculate_prod(10110000110011100010010000)

101 100 0 0110 011100010010000
v5  id4 0 6
011 100 0 1001 0000
v3  id4 0 9
6 * 9 = 54


Solution of
880086C3E88112

100 010 00000000001000011011000011111010001000000100010010
v1  id2 => we have a min
0 000000000100001 1011000011111010001000000100010010
length_type = 0 => 15 bits of length type
000000000100001 = 33 is the number of bits in subpacket

calculate_min(1011000011111010001000000100010010)

... result is 7

Solution of
CE00C43D881120

110 011 10000000001100010000111101100010000001000100100000
v6  id3 => we have a max
length_type = 1 =>
1 00000000011 00010000111101100010000001000100100000
00000000011 = 3 is the number of subpackets each of 11 bits

00010000111 10110001000 00010001001 00000
7           8           9           padding

result is 9


D8005AC2A8F0
110 110 000000000001011010110000101010100011110000
v6  id6 => we have a less than operation
length_type = 0 => 15 bits of length type
0 000000000010110 10110000101010100011110000
000000000010110  = 22 is the number of bits in subpacket

1011000010101010001111 0000

101 100 0 0101 010 100 0 1111 
v5  id4 l 5    v2  id4 l 15
result is 1 because 5 < 15


Solution of
9C0141080250320F1802104A08

100 111 00000000010100000100001000000000100101000000110010000011110001100000000010000100000100101000001000
v4  id7 => we have eq operation

0 000000001010000 0100001000000000100101000000110010000011110001100000000010000100000100101000001000

000000001010000 = 80 which is the number of bits in subpacket

0100001000000000100101000000110010000011 1100011000000000100001000001001010000010 00

010 000 1000000000100101000000110010000011
v2  id0 => we have a sum
1 00000000010 0101000000110010000011
length_type = 11 bits of length type
00000000010 = 2 is the number of subpackets each of 11 bits

010 100 0 0001 100 100 0 0011
v2  id4 l 1    v4  id4 l 3
